name: speech
text_analytics_key: <AZURE LANGUAGE SERVICE (formerly Text Analytics) API KEY>
openai_endpoint: <Azure OpenAI service endpoint for Completion API model>
openai_key: <Azure OpenAI service API key for Completion API model>
openai_deployment_name: <Azure OpenAI service deployment name for Completion API model>
aoai_chatgpt_4_endpoint: <Azure OpenAI service endpoint for Chat API GPT 4 model>
aoai_chatgpt_4_key: <Azure OpenAI service API key for Chat API GPT 4 model>
aoai_chatgpt_4_deployment_name: <Azure OpenAI service deployment name for Chat API GPT 4 model>
consmosdb_connection_string: <COSMOS DB CONNECTION STRING FOR LOGGING - USES NOSQL COSMOS DEPLOYMENT>
azure_storage_connection_string: connection string for Azure Storage Account - used for image analysis only
azure_storage_account_name: Azure Storage Account Name - used for image analysis only
azure_storage_container_name: Azure Storage Container Name - used for image analysis only
gptv_endpoint: Azure OpenAI GPT4 with multimodal (vision) endpoint - used for image analysis only
gptv_key: Azure OpenAI GPT4 with multimodal (vision) key - used for image analysis only
